IC-PBL Team assignment

팀 배분 알고리즘

Team assignemtn for Thursday class

library(tidyverse)
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.0     ✔ readr     2.1.4
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.0
✔ ggplot2   3.4.1     ✔ tibble    3.1.8
✔ lubridate 1.9.2     ✔ tidyr     1.3.0
✔ purrr     1.0.1     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
set.seed(101101)
# input students
students<-c(
"이유정",
"박승연",
"이윤진",
"정재윤",
"김상경",
"정혜림",
"박지원",
"정지윤",
"김재엽",
"김찬우",
"박종현",
"윤지성")

students
 [1] "이유정" "박승연" "이윤진" "정재윤" "김상경" "정혜림" "박지원" "정지윤"
 [9] "김재엽" "김찬우" "박종현" "윤지성"
# No of people per a team
team_size <- 4

# No of team we need
no_team <- length(students) %/% team_size
no_team
[1] 3
# No of remainders
remainder <- length(students) %% team_size
remainder
[1] 0
# Create a tibble (student_no, team)

if (remainder == 0){
  
  tibble(
    seat = 1:length(students),
    team = rep(1:no_team, team_size)
  ) -> seat_table
  
} else {
  
  tibble(
    seat = 1:length(students),
    team = c(rep(1:no_team, team_size),
             1:remainder)
  ) -> seat_table
  
}

seat_table
# A tibble: 12 × 2
    seat  team
   <int> <int>
 1     1     1
 2     2     2
 3     3     3
 4     4     1
 5     5     2
 6     6     3
 7     7     1
 8     8     2
 9     9     3
10    10     1
11    11     2
12    12     3
# Give random number for the students

tibble(
  seat     = sample(1:length(students), 
                    length(students), 
                    replace = F),
  students = students
) -> given_seat
given_seat
# A tibble: 12 × 2
    seat students
   <int> <chr>   
 1     4 이유정  
 2     1 박승연  
 3     5 이윤진  
 4     6 정재윤  
 5     8 김상경  
 6     3 정혜림  
 7     7 박지원  
 8    11 정지윤  
 9    12 김재엽  
10     9 김찬우  
11     2 박종현  
12    10 윤지성  
# Join the team - seat - students

seat_table %>% 
  left_join(given_seat) %>% 
  arrange(team, students) %>% 
  select(-seat) -> team_table
Joining with `by = join_by(seat)`
knitr::kable(team_table)
team students
1 박승연
1 박지원
1 윤지성
1 이유정
2 김상경
2 박종현
2 이윤진
2 정지윤
3 김재엽
3 김찬우
3 정재윤
3 정혜림

Team assignemtn for Tuesday class

library(tidyverse)
set.seed(101101)

# input students

students<-c(
"김정환",
"김숭기",
"김원",
"이정헌",
"노솔",
"최지희",
"조민석",
"김민지",
"김가영",
"박은서",
"임예빈",
"문하윤")

students
 [1] "김정환" "김숭기" "김원"   "이정헌" "노솔"   "최지희" "조민석" "김민지"
 [9] "김가영" "박은서" "임예빈" "문하윤"
# No of people per a team
team_size <- 4

# No of team we need
no_team <- length(students) %/% team_size
no_team
[1] 3
# No of remainders
remainder <- length(students) %% team_size
remainder
[1] 0
# Create a tibble (student_no, team)

if (remainder == 0){
  
  tibble(
    seat = 1:length(students),
    team = rep(1:no_team, team_size)
  ) -> seat_table
  
} else {
  
  tibble(
    seat = 1:length(students),
    team = c(rep(1:no_team, team_size),
             1:remainder)
  ) -> seat_table
  
}

seat_table
# A tibble: 12 × 2
    seat  team
   <int> <int>
 1     1     1
 2     2     2
 3     3     3
 4     4     1
 5     5     2
 6     6     3
 7     7     1
 8     8     2
 9     9     3
10    10     1
11    11     2
12    12     3
# Give random number for the students

tibble(
  seat     = sample(1:length(students), 
                    length(students), 
                    replace = F),
  students = students
) -> given_seat
given_seat
# A tibble: 12 × 2
    seat students
   <int> <chr>   
 1     4 김정환  
 2     1 김숭기  
 3     5 김원    
 4     6 이정헌  
 5     8 노솔    
 6     3 최지희  
 7     7 조민석  
 8    11 김민지  
 9    12 김가영  
10     9 박은서  
11     2 임예빈  
12    10 문하윤  
# Join the team - seat - students

seat_table %>% 
  left_join(given_seat) %>% 
  arrange(team, students) %>% 
  select(-seat) -> team_table
Joining with `by = join_by(seat)`
knitr::kable(team_table)
